title: Critical Thinking (CT) Domain-Specific Training for Language Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Core Language Literacy and Practical Work Experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment with real-time feedback centered on formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the validity of arguments using a structured questioning framework in language analysis contexts.
Learners can identify logical fallacy patterns and propose corrective measures when interpreting language data.
Learners can apply domain-specific CT (Computational Thinking) strategies with over 80% accuracy when solving language-related practical problems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
